title: STK San Juan offers Drink & Dine menu on Sundays
statement: STK San Juan has a Drink & Dine menu available in the restaurant area from 4 to 6pm on Sundays, including 375ml Laurent Perrier Brut.

citations.quote: Drink & Dine available in Restaurant Area Only | 4 to 6pm | Sundays - Daily - NOT AVAILABLE ON HOLIDAYS. Includes 375ml Laurent Perrier Brut
